 Season ()

final void fetch (int series)
 A season is a mapping between a series and the matches. One series can have several seasons and a season consists of several matches.

Member Function Documentation

final void ScheatorDb.Season.fetch ( int  series  ) 

A season is a mapping between a series and the matches. One series can have several seasons and a season consists of several matches.

Fetches the data from the database for a season.

Parameters:
series Series database id.
